text: Matthijs Willem Christiaan "Thijs" Udo (1 May 1954 â€“ 19 January 2025) was a Dutch politician. Udo served as a member of the House of Representatives for the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD) from 1998 to 2002, where he was spokesperson for economic affairs, public health, environment, agriculture and biotechnology. He was also alderman of Katwijk for environment and nature, infrastructure and housing from 2010 to 2014. He held various management and advisory positions within the healthcare sector and within the Small and medium enterprises, including being an administrative law attorney, entrepreneur, member of the Provincial Council of South Holland and regional administrator of Holland Rijnland. Udo died in The Hague on 19 January 2025, at the age of 70. ==References== Category:Dutch politicians Category:1954 births Category:2025 deaths Category:People from Gelderland Category:Place of death missing
title: Thijs Udo
